name: Planet Vacation Club
tag_list: travel, community, trip, trips, travelling, social, vacation, tips, wirlls, planet
overview:
Planet Vacation Club (planetVC) is a startup internet based travel community which offers the common Web 2.0 features and more.

planetVC is a forum from globetrotters for globetrotters provided in English and German. Membership is free. We do provide our members the opportunity:

*      to present themselves and their travel destinations with high resolutions pictures and videos
*      to find friends and organize a travel network through forums, groups, blogs, mail, chat, instant messenger, and pinboards.
*      to quickly access all the information needed to get an idea about the next destination. planetVC features exclusively our Tipps and WIRLLâ€™s section. WIRLL stands for â€œWhat it really looks likeâ€ - through WIRLLâ€™s members present to each other the full unbiased picture in order to avoid traps and dissappointments.
* to easily integrate friends and contacts from other social forums such as Facebook o rXing.

Finally, planetVC has a very flexible software concept designed to adapt quickly to our members needs. It was developed in cooperation with our partner-community â€œwww.deinfussballclub.deâ€, which offers the opportunity to itâ€™s subscribers to co-manage a german soccer club. planetVC is about to launch two additional interactive websites which are designed to promote our travel community worldwide.
